thread.section_title: Vacation Rental Pros Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vacation Rental Pros | vacationrentalpros.com
thread.title: Jaz Padett
thread.title_full: Vacation Rental Pros reviewed by Jaz Padett

author: Jaz Padett
title: Jaz Padett
text: The management is self centered and greed appears to be the motivation. The owner or head guy Steve uses employees and owners then kicks them to the curb not doing the right thing. His employees take things and he does nothing about it. Beware Vacation rental pros. They tell you they will make things right then never contact you again hoping you will go away.
